comment: Suddenly, the Google app will not stay open. Opens for 2 seconds, then closes. Any idea why? It's been working fine until 9/14/2024. Chrome app still works no problem (thankfully). The Google app is a 5 star app, but I gotta it 2 stars for now. Back to 5 stars once resolved.
key sentence: The Google app opens for 2 seconds, then closes unexpectedly.
